inputs.label: provider
inputs.description: LLM provider id (e.g. LMStudio). If unset, uses the node’s configured provider.

inputs.label: model
inputs.description: LLM model id/name. If unset, uses the node’s configured model.

inputs.label: max_iterations
inputs.description: Maximum internal ReAct iterations (safety cap). Higher values allow more tool-use steps.

inputs.label: system
inputs.description: Optional system prompt for this agent instance (high priority instructions).

inputs.label: prompt
inputs.description: The task/user prompt for the agent to solve.

inputs.label: tools
inputs.description: Allowlist of tool names this agent can call (defense-in-depth; runtime still enforces allowlists).

inputs.label: context
inputs.description: Optional explicit context object for the agent (e.g. {messages:[...]}). If provided, it can override inherited run context.

outputs.label: result
outputs.description: Structured final agent result (answer + metadata/tool calls depending on agent).

outputs.label: scratchpad
outputs.description: Runtime-owned execution trace/scratchpad for observability (LLM/tool steps, timings).

inputs.label: provider
inputs.description: LLM provider id (e.g. LMStudio). If unset, uses the node’s configured provider.

inputs.label: model
inputs.description: LLM model id/name. If unset, uses the node’s configured model.

inputs.label: system
inputs.description: Optional system prompt for this single call.

inputs.label: prompt
inputs.description: User prompt/content for this single call.

inputs.label: tools
inputs.description: Allowlist of tools exposed to the model as ToolSpecs (model may request tool calls; execution is done via a Tool Calls node).

outputs.label: response
outputs.description: Assistant text content (best-effort). For tool calls, content may be empty.

outputs.label: result
outputs.description: Full normalized LLM result (content, tool_calls, usage, provider/model metadata, trace_id).

inputs.label: scope
inputs.description: Where to store/index the note: run (this run), session (root run of this run-tree), or global (shared global memory run).

inputs.label: content
inputs.description: The note text to store durably (keep it short; prefer references in sources for large payloads).

inputs.label: location
inputs.description: Optional location label (where the note was produced, e.g. "flow:my_flow/node-12"). Useful for filtering.

inputs.label: tags
inputs.description: Key/value tags for filtering (e.g. {topic:"memory", person:"laurent"}). Values must be strings.

inputs.label: sources
inputs.description: Optional provenance refs (e.g. {run_id, span_ids, message_ids}). The note stores refs, not the full source content.

outputs.label: note_id
outputs.description: The stored note’s span_id / artifact_id. Use it for Recall into context (span_ids) or for precise Recall.

inputs.label: query
inputs.description: Keyword query (substring match over span metadata and small previews). Combined with tags/authors/locations using AND semantics.

inputs.label: limit
inputs.description: Maximum number of spans to return (limit_spans). Default: 5.

inputs.label: tags
inputs.description: Tag filters as key→string or key→list[string]. Reserved key "kind" is ignored.

inputs.label: tags_mode
inputs.description: How to combine tag keys: all (AND) or any (OR). Within a single key, list values are OR.

inputs.label: usernames
inputs.description: Filter by created_by (actor id). Case-insensitive exact match. Empty means no filter.

inputs.label: locations
inputs.description: Filter by location metadata (or tags.location). Case-insensitive exact match.

inputs.label: since
inputs.description: ISO8601 start time. Matches spans whose [from,to] intersects this range.

inputs.label: until
inputs.description: ISO8601 end time. Matches spans whose [from,to] intersects this range.

inputs.label: scope
inputs.description: Which span index to query: run | session | global | all. (all queries run+session-root+global; indices require non-all scopes).

outputs.label: results
outputs.description: Structured match list (meta.matches). Use it to extract span_ids for Recall into context.

inputs.label: span_ids
inputs.description: List of span_ids (artifact_ids) to insert into context.messages. Typically comes from Recall results.

inputs.label: placement
inputs.description: Where to insert: after_summary | after_system | end.

inputs.label: max_messages
inputs.description: Optional cap on inserted messages across all spans (None/empty = unlimited). Useful to avoid huge contexts.

outputs.label: inserted
outputs.description: Number of messages inserted into context.messages.

outputs.label: skipped
outputs.description: Number of messages skipped (usually due to dedup).
